"She whispers to me, even from the depths."
"My mistress sends me her companions."
"Those who blend into the tides are blessed."
"Why walk on water when we can tread the abyss?"
"Her embrace is all the warmth I need."
Made for one destined to destroy
More than enough chaos and despair to go around
"You may escape my gaze, but not my aim."
"Question me, and I'll tie you to the keep, upside-down!"
"Can't have the crew in too good spirits..."
"So it is, even on a good day"
"Even if we take all the Indian Ocean, we will not stop."
It watches your tale unfold
All manner of rogues follow your lead
Let none question your honor
Some chase thrills and glory. Others simply wish to know the sea.
"Swallow this, scurvy seadogs!"
The chaos of the sea should be embraced
"We'll give them something beastly, won't we?"
Of wisdom and shadow, and thoughts as sharp as the sun
One sees the path ahead; another lost to the tides
Belted with gold, worn by one who brings balance
Good fortune is on the horizon
Encircles the spirit, binding strength and serenity
Light as clouds, fierce as thunder
Tread lightly, but leave marks of resolve
Fate makes the call. May it choose well.
March as one. Fight as one. Prosper as one.
Live according to your true nature, or die a coward
Keep the spirits high between bloody battles
Head of your own order and rules
Speak no evil, less you yourself be judged
Curt symbols mark the severity of the crime
By this symbol, command the will of higher powers
The condemned shall receive their true rest
Your word is law
Penance swiftly imposed
The guilty have three strides to repent
To be your enemy is a fatal mistake
So far, none have survived
Only the song of your triumph can be heard
Repentance through punishment
A message to all who forget their place
Your enemies have nowhere to hide
You impose your own form of order
Faith is strength, and you wield it like a blade
Ancestors watch over you
Draws blood in a pinch
A person of prayer is not always a person of peace
You wield each of them at arm's reach
Those knots and twists are imbued with spoken rites
The spirits shall cover your skin
Move to commune
A prayer for healing, or none at all
Orchestrate pain as none other
Cripple the competition
Kill or be killed. Then kill some more.
"Aye, seemed like a nice, round number."
Into your most depraved urges
Waste not a single drop
Keep your skills sharp
The creator watches over his creation
Cloth cut for higher purpose
The medallion whispers on quiet nights
Firm hands carry your sacrifice to other realms
"The hounsi look to use for guidance."
"You shall labor with both hands."
The Keeper guides your path
Sacred symbols shall invoke the spirits
Mark your face for the transformation ahead
Death curses all ailments
"Yes, this will hurt quite a bit..."
Chosen by the dark and arcane
"Blades and gunpowder will not save you."
More venomous than any snake
"May ill-fortune befall you, and curse your lineage!"
Spewing evil wisdom as you desire
The serpents grant you peace and purity
Terrible things would spew from its maw
The venom seeps, creeps and eats
Its very presence rots away courage
Truly a beast of many nightmares
Spreading from sea to sea, who can tell what is true?
Some sights can stop the hearts of men
Where many act as one, success follows
"Only in battle do I find clarity."
"Even pain holds great lessons."
"Until my heart stops, I continue my crusade."
"There is no grander sight than vengeance at its bloodiest."
"My life a clamor, my death a wisper."
"Esteemed voices call on me to punish and destroy."
"I am shaped by generations of rage."
"We may grace the same sea, but my purpose is truer."
Some lives are worth more than others
Satisfaction is the true reward
The wicked have nowhere to hide
Perhaps you are but the instrument of fate
Delivered with grave conviction
"All towards one goal -- a vicious reckoning."
Known for getting into misadventures
Loves leaping out from the shadows to scare the crew
Pity is wasted on the weak
One can be ruthless and sophisticated both
A notion that requires constant vigilance
A position won by impressive deeds
You will make your own history on the high seas
Every move serves a greater purpose
True to your nature
Each feather a pirate slain
Only need one to see evil
Bury the freebooters, not their booty
Belonged to a loved one, wrongly cut down
No mercy for the wicked
Doubles as a gallows rope
Firm resolve to burn all rogues
Only good pirate's dead one
"Ptuh! There's your parley."
May golden rays reach the depths of your pockets
Simply inimitable
Always a step ahead of the megacorporations
"Give the people what they want! For a pretty penny, of course."
You slippery devil, you
"Can't have our cups going empty, eh?"
"Stuff the hold, fill our coffers."
As harsh and ferocious as the Indian Ocean itself
"It's my ship, and my cargo, so hands off, ye' scurvy dogs!"
Only good tidings on the breeze
"Only thing better than rum is stolen rum!"
Heatstroke is the enemy of fun
Stare at the sun too long and you'll not have any fun
Not much for protection, but still cool as hell

Soaks up the sting of sweat
Also serves as a beach towel
Party all night long
Sleek on the deck and in the midst of danger
"Allow me to sing you a fitting elegy."
"In the end, hell awaits all us seadogs."
You are as twisted as they come

"We no longer know who, or what, we are."

Even the fiercest cold simply strengthens your will

"Far more than riches are at stake."

Spread your influence, make your mark
Feared at sea and on land

Here there be monsters

Kill to survive
Take what you can
Eliminate every last enemy

Twice the violence and mayhem
As a polished barrel
Painted by your triumph

"Your misfortune, our boon."

Your bloodlust is known to all

"When will I see my flesh and blood once more?"

Like the blood of one who leapt to their death among the rocks and waves

Wards to protect against cursed seas

Appease the restless spirits or regret it
Peaceful traits to you, Captain

All life shall be yours to consume
Your victims shall look upon hell itself
" I swear I'm not hopping on purpose."

description.general: corpse Drivers
Your victims will try to withhold their essence

Reap indiscriminately

Breathtaking yet unnerving

Every sinner pays the price

Rise from below and conquer all

Wickedness lurks in the shadows and quit
Sinners beware

The more you gain, the more you crave
